column4: Hey all, I have a quick question. How do I connect to a windows server using Samba?
the quick and easy way is to select "Network" from the Places menu in gnome (if you are running normal ubuntu), you should be able to browse the windows network like you could in windows
It doesn't work because for some reason, it's not specified, it won't let me access the windows network
if you install the right packages you can also use the smbmount commant to mount windows shares, I don't know the packages or the syntax atm :-(
